duties_responsibilities.duty: React quickly to the patient and directions from the doctor in the emergency room setting.
Provide age-appropriate care to patients based on physical, psychosocial, cultural, safety, and learning needs.
Perform delegated duties consistent with scope of practice and functions within the philosophy and overall plan of care delivery.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an Accredited School of Nursing; BSN desirable
Current Registered Nurse license in the State of Colorado or current RN compact license from another state for the 1st 180 days of employment
Current BCLS, ACLS, PALS and TNCC required, ENPC & NRP certification preferred.
1 to 2 years acute care/specialty nursing desired
Fully vaccinated for COVID-19 based on local, state, and/or federal law or regulations
